NCS Champion teacher day at Thorpe Park
Here at NCS, we value working with all our schools. You are invited on behalf of your school/college to attend an exclusive event hosted in partnership with Thorpe Park.
The day will involve:
Free entry to Thorpe Park Networking with other teachers from across Surrey Refreshments Thorpe Park Education programmes NCS workshop
Date: Saturday 17th September 2016 Time: TBC
This is an email link: danielle.ellis@the-challenge.org to show your interest.
We will send out a detailed agenda nearer the time along with directions for the day.
We are really looking forward to hearing from you.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
